name: Kirk Franklin
description: '''Kirk Dewayne Franklin''' (born January 26, 1970) is an American gospel musician, rapper, singer, songwriter, and record producer. Franklin's accolades include 20 [[Grammy Awards]]. ''[[Variety (magazine)|Variety]]'' has called Franklin a "Reigning King of Urban Gospel", and Franklin is one of the inaugural inductees into the [[Black Music & Entertainment Walk of Fame]]. Franklin has also been associated with The Family, [[God's Property]], and [[One Nation Crew]] (1NC).
